code: import{PureComponent}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class TasksFilter extends PureComponent{constructor(props){super(props);this.selectedFooterItem=e=>{let el=e.target.closest('button');if(!el)return;const selectElement=this.state.elementName.map(item=>item.className===el.className?{className:el.className+=' selected',select:true}:{className:item.className.replace(' selected',''),select:false});this.setState({elementName:selectElement});};this.state={elementName:[{className:'all selected',select:true},{className:'active',select:false},{className:'complete',select:false}]};}render(){const{allList,activeList,completedList}=this.props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"filters",onClick:this.selectedFooterItem,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:this.state.elementName[0].className,onClick:()=>allList(),children:"All"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:this.state.elementName[1].className,onClick:()=>activeList(),children:"Active"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:this.state.elementName[2].className,onClick:()=>completedList(),children:"Completed"})})]});}}export default TasksFilter;
